companies.name: Fyle
work: Have been dabbling across the tech stack. Mainly AngularJS (Front-End), Django (Eventhandler and several services) and Spring (Back-End).
Leading contributions in migrating AngularJS to newer versions of Angular.
Recently I worked on a full infra revamp of a server side PDF generation service.

companies.name: Alippo
work: Built the company’s entire e-commerce front-end on top of an VueJS based open-source.

Added support for payment gateway integration into the open source. (Got in touch with the lead developer for the PR but was declined as the payment gateway flow was mostly specific for Indian based payment gateways)
Built several feature flows on the open source to help with the gamification part of e-commerce.

companies.name: Flabber Tech

Formulated a PR Review, Testing and Deployment workflow for the engineering and design team.
Maintained the company’s frontend master branch and performed periodical deployments.

companies.name: Hyssop

Integrated few Magento based APIs into the wordpress front-end.

companies.name: SDMCET

companies.name: Insignia
